doc.excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Waste Pickers by Gabriel Bjork Stiernstrom

main.div:
Skip to content
Issue 124 – January 2017
Cover Art
Waste Pickers
Gabriel Bjork Stiernstrom is a concept artist and illustrator from Gothenburg, Sweden. His main focus is concept design for games and films but he has also done book covers, matte paintings, and promotional artwork.

div.p: ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
